summary: Pickpocket and Lockpicking skills became one tree.
descriptionHtml:
Pickpocket and Lockpicking skills became one tree.
Renamed the original pickpocket tree to Lycanthropy.
Added a five tiered perk which is only selectable if you are a werewolf.
[u]Wolf Claws:[/u]
Increases Unarmed damage by 20%/rank
Prerequests:
-1st rank be a werewolf
-2nd you have to be at least level 10
-3rd 20
-4th 30
-5th 40

[u]Endurance of the Hunter[/u]
-1/2 health point/second
-1st rank needs level 10
-2nd rank needs level 20

[u]Endurance of the Hunter[/u]
-While in beast form you are moving faster and have a 10% chance to dodge the attacks.

Checkout my real project too:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8231]Combat-related Perks Overhaul[/url]
author: Templar-von-Midgard
